text: Then said the princes of the Philistines, What <FI>do<Fi> these Hebrews <FI>here<Fi> ? And Achish said unto the princes of the Philistines, Is not this David, the servant of Saul the king of Israel, who hath been with me these days, or <FI>rather<Fi> these years, and I have found no fault in him since he fell away <FI>unto me<Fi> unto this day?
name: I Samuel 29:3
